contentencoded: Elliot Bergman who, along with his sister Natalie, makes music as Wild Belle, tells us a fitting joke…about wild bells. (Their debut album, Isles, is out now.)

description: Elliot Bergman who, along with his sister Natalie, makes music as Wild Belle, tells us a fitting joke…about wild bells. (Their debut album, Isles, is out now.)
title: Elliot Bergman of Wild Belle Gets Meta
teaser: Elliot Bergman who, along with his sister Natalie, makes music as Wild Belle, tells us a fitting joke…about wild bells. (Their debut album, Isles, is out now.)
